text: @realDonaldTrump IF YOU WANT TO HAVE TIME TO PLAY GOLF, then resign, you'll have all the time that you want to play golf.  But with a total of US Coronavirus Cases at 3,355,895 and US Deaths at 137,405, 48,000,000 Americans making their new claims for unemployment in the past 16 weeks, well..
